title: Make your system ready for the course

paragraphs.text: And verify your docker installation (versions will be higher)

code.script:
docker --version
Docker version 20.10.12, build ...

docker-compose --version
docker-compose version v2.2.3

paragraphs.text: There are 2 popular docker images for Apache Kafka: Wurstmeister and Bitnami, we follow the Wurstmeister one.
Follow <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4xFZ_iTZLTs&t=510s&ab_channel=BetterDataScience" target="_blank">Instructions for docker and kafka setup
The code for wurstmeister, the used ports for zookeeper(port 2181) and the kafka broker (port 9092) are the default ports used
go to the directory where kafka scripts are located
For these and more instructions download following file, cd wurstmeister, unzip wurstmeister
